Providential Openings 

     NEVER IN THE HISTORY OF THE WORLD HAVE THERE BEEN SO MANY PROVIDENTIAL OPENINGS FOR THE GOSPEL IN FOREIGN LANDS. NEVER HAVE THE CALLS BEEN MORE URGENT FOR MEN AND MEANS, AND NEVER HAS THERE EXISTED A GREATER NEED. "Our burden for the 'regions 
                                                                           4
beyond' can never be laid down until the whole earth shall be lightened with the glory of the Lord."--Id., p. 29.
